title: Need Help Identifying Laura Worthington Style Script Font
content:
Does anyone know what this script font is? I've identified lots of similar fonts, but none that are a match. Any help would be extremely appreciated! :) Thanks so much!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418181949im_/http:/typophile.com/files/script%20font_6459.jpg)
author: figrsk8r

comments.content:
Riddle recreated by Mario Arturo and Harold Lohner.  
 [http://www.dafont.com/search.php?q=riddle&text=Jen+baggett](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418181949/http:/www.dafont.com/search.php?q=riddle&text=Jen+baggett)  
Very limited character set.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418181949im_/http:/typophile.com/files/jenb1_3906.jpg)
Thank you so very much. I just need it for a logo and I'd just figured it out as well.
